introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: I'm Kunyang(Jeffrey) Li. A Third-year honors student studying Computer Science at Northeastern University's Khoury College of Computer Sciences. Experience in Java, Javascript, and several functional programming languages,  I'm interested in learning more about software development and being able to connect it to my other skills!

introduction.title: 个人简介
introduction.content: 李坤阳：就读于东北大学 Khoury 计算机科学学院荣誉学生。拥有 Java、Javascript 和几种函数式编程语言的经验，有兴趣了解更多关于软件开发的知识，并能够将其与我的其他技能联系起来！!

experiences.title: Backend Developer
projects: Improved time efficiency by automating the process of device register process.
Builded projects management system which enable admins to track of each project's progress.
Developed image capture and upload method which help visalize the project's progress by day and month.

experiences.title: Content Operation
projects: Increase DAU by 4% through inviting experts to talk about hot topics on the market.
Operate an official account and increase the number of followers by 5k through collecting great articles write by users.

texts: Honor Program with 60k scholarships, Major in Computer Science with Software Concentration.
College: Khoury College of Cumputer Science.
Courses (A-LEVEL): Further Math, Advanced Math, Physics, Chemical, Economies.
Extracurricular activities: AP physics & AP Calculus BC, School footall team.

experiences.title: 后台开发
projects: 通过自动化设备注册过程来提高时间效率。
建立项目管理系统，使管理员能够跟踪每个项目的进度。
开发了图像捕获和上传方法，有助于按日和月可视化项目进度。

experiences.title: 内容运营
projects: 通过邀请专家谈论市场上的热门话题，增加4%的DAU。
运营公众号，通过收集用户写的精彩文章，增加5k关注者。

texts: 荣誉项目，6万美金奖学金
课程 (A-LEVEL): Further Math, Advanced Math, Physics, Chemical, Economies.
额外课程: AP physics & AP Calculus BC, 足球校队.

links.name: Thoughs Share
links.description_en: A platform that allow users to freely post their thoughs or blogs
links.description_zh: 用户可以自由注册发布自己的想法和文章
